title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee
descriptions:
**Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc - Revolutionize Your Outdoor Fun!**

Are you ready to take your outdoor games to the next level? Look no further than the TOSY Flying Disc, the ultimate LED flying disc that will illuminate your fun!

This isn't just any ordinary frisbee - it's a game-changer. With an astonishing 16 million color RGB LED lights, our disc is 100 times brighter than any other light-up flying disc on the market. Choose from 36 or 360 LEDs to create an unforgettable experience.

But that's not all. Our smart disc comes equipped with motion sensors that automatically light up when you're ready to play. Plus, enjoy multiple smart modes, including adjustable brightness levels and a timer mode to keep your games going all night long.

Rechargeable and ready to go, our disc powers up in just 30 minutes and provides up to a thousand throws or 90 minutes of continuous playtime. And with its durable, waterproof design, you can play worry-free in any weather conditions.

Whether you're a pro or just starting out, our disc meets professional ultimate standards and is perfect for night play, freestyle tricks, and disc games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes. The comfortable grip and precise flight quality make it a joy to throw and catch.

Make this Christmas, birthday, or camping trip one to remember with the TOSY Flying Disc. Order now and experience the thrill of outdoor fun like never before!

**Key Features:**

* 16 million color RGB LED lights (36 or 360 LEDs)
* 100 times brighter than other light-up flying discs
* Smart modes: adjustable brightness, timer mode, and motion sensors
* Rechargeable: 30-minute charge, up to 90 minutes playtime
* Durable, waterproof design
* Meets professional ultimate standards
* Perfect for night play, freestyle tricks, and disc games
* Comfortable grip and precise flight quality

**Get ready to light up the night and take your outdoor fun to new heights!**

**Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc - The Ultimate Game Changer!**

Are you ready to take your flying disc game to new heights? Look no further! The TOSY Flying Disc is the most advanced, high-tech, and fun flying disc you'll ever own. With its mesmerizing 16 million color RGB lights, this disc is sure to light up the night sky and leave everyone in awe.

**Unparalleled Brightness**

With 36 or 360 LEDs, our disc is an astonishing 100 times brighter than any other light-up flying disc on the market. The vibrant lights will illuminate your path, making it perfect for night play, freestyle tricks, and disc games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes.

**Smart Modes and Motion Sensors**

This intelligent disc features advanced smart modes, including adjustable brightness levels, timer mode, and motion sensors that automatically light up the disc when you're ready to play. The motion sensors also ensure the lights turn off when the disc is idle, conserving battery life.

**Rechargeable and Long-Lasting**

The TOSY Flying Disc is rechargeable via a convenient USB Type C to C cable (included). With a quick 30-minute charge, you'll get up to a thousand throws or 90 minutes of continuous playtime.

**Professional Standard and Durable**

Designed to meet professional ultimate standards, this disc boasts a weight of 175 grams, making it perfect for long, straight, and precise flights. The comfortable grip and highly durable construction ensure it can withstand even the toughest play. Plus, it's waterproof, so you can play worry-free in any weather conditions.

**The Perfect Gift**

The TOSY Flying Disc is an ideal gift for men, boys, teens, and kids who love outdoor games, camping, and adventure. It's a unique and exciting way to enjoy the great outdoors with friends and family.

**Get Ready to Take Flight!**

Order your TOSY Flying Disc today and experience the thrill of flying disc play like never before!

**Introducing the TOSY Flying Disc - Revolutionize Your Outdoor Fun!**

Are you ready to take your outdoor games and activities to the next level? Look no further! The TOSY Flying Disc is here to revolutionize the way you play, with its unparalleled brightness, smart modes, and advanced features.

**Unbeatable Brightness**

With 36 or 360 LEDs, our flying disc is a staggering 100 times brighter than any other light-up disc on the market. Experience the thrill of playing at night or in low-light conditions with our 16 million color RGB LEDs, making every throw a mesmerizing spectacle.

**Smart Modes for Endless Fun**

Our flying disc comes equipped with advanced smart modes, including adjustable brightness levels, timer mode, and motion sensors that automatically light up when you're ready to play. Plus, enjoy a seamless gaming experience with our rechargeable battery that lasts up to 90 minutes or a thousand throws.

**Professional-Grade Performance**

Designed for the pros and enthusiasts alike, our flying disc meets professional ultimate standards, ensuring a long, straight, and precise flight. The comfortable grip and durable design make it perfect for freestyle tricks, disc games like Beersbee and Polish Horseshoes, and night play.

**Convenience and Durability**

Recharge your flying disc in just 30 minutes with the included USB Type C to C cable. Plus, enjoy peace of mind with our highly durable and waterproof design, built to withstand even the toughest outdoor conditions.

**The Ultimate Gift Idea**

Give the gift of outdoor fun and excitement to your friends and family. Perfect for birthdays, Christmas, and camping trips, the TOSY Flying Disc is an unforgettable present that will leave a lasting impression.

**Get Ready to Take Your Outdoor Adventures to New Heights!**

Order your TOSY Flying Disc today and experience the thrill of playing like never before!
